description: This file defines utility functions for Base64 encoding, providing both a core encoding function and a convenience overload for std::string. It belongs to the WPEFramework::Utils namespace and is intended for use across the project to encode binary data into Base64 strings, with optional URL-safe encoding.
published: WPEFramework::Utils::Base64Encode(const void *data, std::size_t len, bool urlSafe)

methods.name: std::string Base64Encode(const std::string & s,bool urlSafe=false)
methods.description: Encodes binary data into a Base64 string, with optional URL-safe variant.

methods.name: std::string Base64Encode(const void * data,std::size_t len,bool urlSafe=false)
methods.description: Encodes a std::string into a Base64 string, with optional URL-safe variant.
